00028 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #ifndef __HT32_RETARGET_DESC_H
00030 #define __HT32_RETARGET_DESC_H
00031 
00032 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00033 
00034   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00035   /* IAD to associate the two CDC interfaces                                                                */
00036   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00038   8,                          // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00039   11,                         // bDescriptorType     1 Descriptor Type
00040   11,                         // bFirstInterface     1
00041   2,                          // bInterfaceCount     1
00042   2,                          // bFunctionClass      1
00043   2,                          // bFunctionSubClass   1
00044   0,                          // bFunctionProtocol   1
00045   0x00,                       // iFunction           1 Index of string descriptor describing this function.
00046 
00047   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00048   /* Interface descriptor                                                                                   */
00049   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00051                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052   DESC_LEN_INF,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00053   DESC_TYPE_04_INF,           // bDescriptorType     1 INTERFACE Descriptor Type
00054   11,                         // bInterfaceNumber    1 Number of this interface (Zero-based 0)
00055   0x00,                       // bAlternateSetting   1 Value used to select alternate setting
00056   1,                          // bNumEndpoints       1 Number of endpoints used by this interface
00057   DESC_CLASS_02_CDC_CTRL,     // bInterfaceClass     1 Class code (assigned by USB-IF)
00058   2,                          // bInterfaceSubClass  1 Subclass code (assigned by USB-IF)
00059   0,                          // bInterfaceProtocol  1 Protocol code (assigned by USB)
00060   0x00,                       // iInterface          1 Index of string descriptor describing this interface
00061 
00062   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00063   /* Header Functional descriptor                                                                           */
00064   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00065                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00066                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00067   5,                          // bFunctionLength     1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00068   0x24,                       // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE descriptor type
00069   0,                          // bDescriptorSubtype  1 header functional descriptor
00070   DESC_H2B(0x0110),           // bcdCDC              2 spec release number
00071 
00072   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00073   /* Abstract control management Functional                                                                 */
00074   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00075                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00076                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00077   4,                          // bFunctionLength     1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00078   0x24,                       // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE descriptor type
00079   2,                          // bDescriptorSubtype  1 Abstract Control Management Functional descriptor
00080   0x02,                       // bmCapabilities      1
00081 
00082   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00083   /* Union Functional                                                                                       */
00084   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00085                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00086                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00087   5,                          // bFunctionLength     1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00088   0x24,                       // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE descriptor type
00089   5,                          // bDescriptorSubtype  1 Union Functional descriptor
00090   0x00,                       // bMasterInterface    1 Communication class interface
00091   0x01,                       // bSlaveInterface0    1 Data Class Interface
00092 
00093   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00094   /* Call Management Functional                                                                             */
00095   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00096                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00097                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00098   5,                          // bFunctionLength     1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00099   0x24,                       // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE descriptor type
00100   1,                          // bDescriptorSubtype  1 Call Management Functional descriptor
00101   0x00,                       // bmCapabilities      1
00102   0x01,                       // bDataInterface      1 Interface number of Data
00103 
00104   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00105   /* Endpoint descriptor                                                                                    */
00106   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00107                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00108                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00109   DESC_LEN_EPT,               // bLengthE            1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00110   DESC_TYPE_05_EPT,           // bDescriptorType     1 ENDPOINT Descriptor Type
00111   (0x80 | RETARGET_CTRL_EPT), // bEndpointAddress    1 The address of the endpoint
00112                               //                        Bit 3..0: The endpoint number
00113                               //                        Bit 6..4: Reserved
00114                               //                        Bit 7   : Direction (0 = Out/1 = In)
00115   0x03,                       // bmAttribute         1 Endpoint Attribute
00116                               //                        Bit 1..0: Transfer type
00117                               //                                  00 = Control
00118                               //                                  01 = Isochronous
00119                               //                                  10 = Bulk
00120                               //                                  11 = Interrupt
00121                               //                        All other reserved
00122   DESC_H2B(RETARGET_CTRL_LEN),// wMaxPacketSize      2 Maximum packet size
00123   0x00,                       // bInterval           1 Interval for polling endpoint
00124 
00125   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00126   /* Data class interface descriptor                                                                        */
00127   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00128                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00129                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00130   DESC_LEN_INF,               // bLength             1 Endpoint Descriptor size
00131   DESC_TYPE_04_INF,           // bDescriptorType     1
00132   12,                         // bInterfaceNumber    1 Number of Interface
00133   0x00,                       // bAlternateSetting   1 Alternate setting
00134   2,                          // bNumEndpoints       1 Two endpoints used
00135   DESC_CLASS_0A_CDC_DATA,     // bInterfaceClass     1
00136   0,                          // bInterfaceSubClass  1
00137   0,                          // bInterfaceProtocol  1
00138   0x00,                       // iInterface          1
00139 
00140   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00141   /* Endpoint n Out descriptor                                                                              */
00142   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00143                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00144                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00145   DESC_LEN_EPT,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00146   DESC_TYPE_05_EPT,           // bDescriptorType     1 ENDPOINT Descriptor Type
00147   (0x00 | RETARGET_RX_EPT),   // bEndpointAddress    1 The address of the endpoint
00148                               //                        Bit 3..0: The endpoint number
00149                               //                        Bit 6..4: Reserved
00150                               //                        Bit 7   : Direction (0 = Out/1 = In)
00151   0x02,                       // bmAttribute         1 Endpoint Attribute
00152                               //                        Bit 1..0: Transfer type
00153                               //                                  00 = Control
00154                               //                                  01 = Isochronous
00155                               //                                  10 = Bulk
00156                               //                                  11 = Interrupt
00157                               //                        All other reserved
00158   DESC_H2B(RETARGET_RX_LEN),  // wMaxPacketSize      2 Maximum packet size
00159   0x00,                       // bInterval           1 Interval for polling endpoint
00160 
00161   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00162   /* Endpoint n In Descriptor                                                                               */
00163   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00164                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00165                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00166   DESC_LEN_EPT,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00167   DESC_TYPE_05_EPT,           // bDescriptorType     1 ENDPOINT Descriptor Type
00168   (0x80 | RETARGET_TX_EPT),   // bEndpointAddress    1 The address of the endpoint
00169                               //                        Bit 3..0: The endpoint number
00170                               //                        Bit 6..4: Reserved
00171                               //                        Bit 7   : Direction (0 = Out/1 = In)
00172   0x02,                       // bmAttribute         1 Endpoint Attribute
00173                               //                        Bit 1..0: Transfer type
00174                               //                                  00 = Control
00175                               //                                  01 = Isochronous
00176                               //                                  10 = Bulk
00177                               //                                  11 = Interrupt
00178                               //                        All other reserved
00179   DESC_H2B(RETARGET_TX_LEN),  // wMaxPacketSize      2 Maximum packet size
00180   0x00,                       // bInterval           1 Interval for polling endpoint
00181 
00182 #endif /* __HT32_RETARGET_DESC_H ---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
